T02D2520:110a-0: @110a * // dpal mchog dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugs /
T02D2520:110a-2: # // dpal mchog dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2520:110a-3: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2520:110a-4: sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02D2520:110a-7: lo re zhing rnal 'byor chen po nyid kyis dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya'o //
T02D2520:110a-8: de la dang po kho nar yo byad thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pas ;
T02D2520:110a-9: mngon par 'dod pa'i sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi
T02D2520:110a-10: phye ma'i sbyin sreg dang mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg
T02D2520:110a-11: gi cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog la /
T02D2520:110a-12: bdag dang slob ma'i bgegs zhi bar byed pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2520:110a-13: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis sems can gdug
T02D2520:110a-14: pa can rnams bskrad la gnas bsrung bar bya ste
T02D2520:110a-15: / yang de nyid kyi sngags lan bdun bzlas pa'i
T02D2520:110a-16: nyungs kar dang chu dang thal ba rnams kyis gtor
T02D2520:110a-17: / la / sa'i phyogs der khru gang tsam mam /
T02D2520:110b-1: thal ba la sogs pa bsal te /
T02D2520:110b-2: dag cing dri zhim pa'i sas bkang la /
T02D2520:110b-3: rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i sbos chus spang zhing 'thas par bcag par bya'o //
T02D2520:110b-4: shin tu mnyam pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i khang pa brtsegs
T02D2520:110b-5: pa'i nang du chud par rta babs bzhis mdzes par
T02D2520:110b-6: byas pa / sgo bzhi sgo glegs bzang pos brkos ba'i gnas su //
T02D2520:110b-7: slob ma shin tu mkhas pas shar phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2520:110b-8: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags bzlas pa'i ba'i rnam
T02D2520:110b-9: lngas legs par byug cing de nyid yongs su bzlas
T02D2520:110b-10: pa'i spos chus bsang gtor bya ba dang /
T02D2520:110b-11: de nyid yongs su bzlas pa'i rin po che dang /
T02D2520:110b-12: 'bru dang sman thams cad de'i dbus su gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2520:110b-13: sa yongs su sbyang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2520:110b-14: de las yongs su sbyangs shing 'thas par bcags zin pa rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la /
T02D2520:110b-16: chu dang thal ba rnams la rdo rje gnod sbyin
T02D2520:110b-17: gyi sngags lan bdun bzlas pas mngon par gtor bar
T02D2520:110b-18: bya'o // de nas yang slob ma shin tu mkhas
T02D2520:110b-19: pas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags lan bdun bzlas
T02D2520:110b-20: pa'i ba'i rnam lngas legs par byug cing /
T02D2520:110b-21: spos chus kyang phyogs nger bsang gtor bya'o//
T02D2520:110b-22: de nas rin po che dang /
T02D2520:110b-23: 'bru sman thams cad la bzlas brjod lan bdun byas pas de'i dbus su gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2520:110b-24: 'di yis 'dir sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2520:110b-25: de nas yang slob ma shin tu mkhas pas sa'i shar phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2520:110b-26: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags yongs su bzlas pa'i dris legs par byug par bya'o //
T02D2520:110b-29: ris su bris pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D2520:110b-30: dbang phyug che sogs phyag rgya yis //
T02D2520:110b-31: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas //
T02D2520:110b-32: rigs pa'i tshogs rnams kyis brgyan cing //
T02D2520:110b-33: tha mar mtshon gyi ra bas nye bar mdzes par bya ba dang /
T02D2520:110b-34: rgyal mtshan gyi dam pa dang /
T02D2520:110b-35: bla re'i mchog dril bu btags pa bre ba dang /
T02D2520:110b-36: me tog dang mar me dang /
T02D2520:110b-38: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /
T02D2520:111a-2: ba dan dang phreng ba rnams dang /
T02D2520:111a-3: sgo bzhi dang mtshams bzhir spos khang bzhag pa dang /
T02D2520:111a-6: gar rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2520:111a-7: sa la lag pa bzhag ste /
T02D2520:111a-8: h'um dang yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2520:111a-9: sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2520:111a-10: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
T02D2520:111a-11: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
T02D2520:111a-12: dang po'i rdo rjes dkyil 'khor gyi yul la phyag
T02D2520:111a-13: bya ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sngom
T02D2520:111a-14: pa bzung nas lha'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02D2520:111a-17: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
T02D2520:111a-18: 'di ltar bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2520:111a-19: deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02D2520:111a-20: bdag gi gson pa 'bras bur bcas //
T02D2520:111a-21: lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par //
T02D2520:111a-22: gyur par bdag ni som nyi med //
T02D2520:111a-23: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02D2520:111a-24: mi ldog par ni bdag 'gyur te //
T02D2520:111a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02D2520:111a-26: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
T02D2520:111a-27: deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
T02D2520:111a-28: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med ;
T02D2520:111a-29: / sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02D2520:111a-30: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
T02D2520:111a-31: de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
T02D2520:111a-32: bdug sbos phul te sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2520:111a-33: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02D2520:111a-34: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02D2520:111a-35: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02D2520:111a-36: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2520:111a-37: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
T02D2520:111a-38: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //
T02D2520:111a-39: zhes brjod de yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas te /
T02D2520:111a-41: dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs dang las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms la /
T02D2520:111a-42: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2520:111a-43: h'um zlos pa la brtson zhing phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2520:111a-44: de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2520:111b-0: bdag nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @111b kyis gsol ba btab par gyur par bsams te /
T02D2520:111b-1: bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02D2520:111b-2: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D2520:111b-3: snying po 'di ni rtag pa nyid //
T02D2520:111b-4: bde chen myur du bsgrub par mdzod //
T02D2520:111b-5: ces bya bas gsol ba btab par bsam mo //
T02D2520:111b-6: de nas de las langs te /
T02D2520:111b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te /
T02D2520:111b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' kun du gang bar bsams la /
T02D2520:111b-9: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02D2520:111b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
T02D2520:111b-11: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02D2520:111b-12: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid //
T02D2520:111b-13: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag / phyag na rdo rje bstan bdag ste //
T02D2520:111b-14: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag / byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro //
T02D2520:111b-16: mchog tu dam tshig gsum thob pa'i //
T02D2520:111b-17: slob dpon rang gi phyag rgya yis //
T02D2520:111b-18: rdo rje dril bu 'chang bya zhing //
T02D2520:111b-19: 'khor lo'i cho ga thams cad bya //
T02D2520:111b-20: rtog pa kun la snyoms 'jug pas //
T02D2520:111b-21: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02D2520:111b-22: dam tshig che gsum ces bya ba'i //
T02D2520:111b-23: rgya 'di gsang sngags sgrub byed pa'o //
T02D2520:111b-24: dngos grub kun gyi chog la //
T02D2520:111b-25: rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas //
T02D2520:111b-26: chog lhag gam ma tshang na ;
T02D2520:111b-28: de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon du byas la /
T02D2520:111b-29: dang po'i rdo rje h'um badzra au tishtha ma h'a mandala au tha pa la zhes brjod do //
T02D2520:111b-30: bar snang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor bzhag la /
T02D2520:111b-31: bdag nyid bdag po'i rdo rje de nyid h'um gis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2520:111b-32: yang phyag rgya chen po bsams te /
T02D2520:111b-33: aom badzra tishtha ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod de /
T02D2520:111b-34: de bzhin du langs la phyag rgyas gnas pas thams cad du bltas te /
T02D2520:111b-35: bsnyems pas h'um 'don zhing song la rkang pa gnyis
T02D2520:111b-36: kyi 'og tu aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams
T02D2520:111b-37: te / rkang pa nas brtsams nas nam mkha'i khams
T02D2520:111b-38: ma lus pa dang mnyam par gnas pa'i sa'i cha
T02D2520:111b-39: rdo rjer gyur par lhag par mos par byas la
T02D2520:111b-40: te / / rdo rje'i lta bas kyang g-yon par bgegs bsal te /
T02D2520:112a-0: bskor phyogs dang steng phyogs dang nam mkha'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor mtshams bcad @112a * //
T02D2520:112a-2: rab dang dra ba dag bya'o //
T02D2520:112a-3: de nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye la /
T02D2520:112a-4: rdo rje rgyu'i ngo bo zhal bzhi pa /
T02D2520:112a-5: phyag bzhi pa'i gsang ba'i gzugs can gyis dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /
T02D2520:112a-6: sngags 'di dang ldan pas dgug par bya'o //
T02D2520:112a-7: aom ma h'a badzra mandala h'um dza: rdo rje khu
T02D2520:112a-8: tshur gnyis las mthe bong dang mdzub mo rdo rjer
T02D2520:112a-9: bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad dgug par byed
T02D2520:112a-10: pa rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2520:112a-11: // aom badzra tsakra aa dhi tishtha siddham h'um /
T02D2520:112a-12: zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor yang byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2520:112a-13: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul
T02D2520:112a-14: du mgal me bskor ba ltar bya ba ni 'di'i
T02D2520:112a-15: phyag rgya'o // de nas seng ldeng gi rdo rje
T02D2520:112a-16: phur bu mtha' yas dang rnam par rgyal ba dang
T02D2520:112a-17: phyag rgya'o // / sprin sgra dang gsus po che rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2520:112a-18: rim pa bzhin du steng gi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02D2520:112a-23: rta mgrin lta bu la 'og rdo rje rtse gcig
T02D2520:112a-24: pa lta bur bskyed la tsandan dmar po byug cing
T02D2520:112a-26: me tog gi phreng ba dmar pos bcings la /
T02D2520:112a-27: aom ko ta ya tri ya ta ma /
T02D2520:112a-28: tsi ta tra ti ta ma ta zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te /
T02D2520:112a-29: de g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
T02D2520:112a-30: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhir dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2520:112a-31: rdo rje thal mos brdung bar bya'o //
T02D2520:112a-32: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la /
T02D2520:112a-33: srung ba byas te de bzhin du rdo rje khu
T02D2520:112a-34: tshur gyis sgo bcad la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi
T02D2520:112a-35: srung bas yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02D2520:112a-36: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bum pa
T02D2520:112a-37: dkyil 'khor gyi skor bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir gzhag
T02D2520:112a-38: par bya'o // de nas sbos chu la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bzlas pa de nyid 'don cing /
T02D2520:112a-39: sbos chus dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi byug par bya'o //
T02D2520:112a-40: de nas lha thams cad kyi gnas su dri'i dkyil 'khor byas la /
T02D2520:112a-41: lag pas bran la h'um lan bdun de dag la bzlas la /
T02D2520:112b-0: de rnams su dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nam mkha'i @112b phyogs nas phab ste /
T02D2520:112b-1: h'um nyid kyis bcug la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod do /
T02D2520:112b-2: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la /
T02D2520:112b-3: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ji skad du bshad
T02D2520:112b-4: pa'i mtshan nyid rnams dang ldan pa sman dang 'bru
T02D2520:112b-5: dang rin po che la sogs pa yang dag par
T02D2520:112b-7: chu nyung zad blugs te rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02D2520:112b-8: rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T02D2520:112b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' la re re zhing yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i /
T02D2520:112b-10: mchod yon bum pa'i steng du bzhag la /
T02D2520:112b-11: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bzung ba'i rdo rje dang //
T02D2520:112b-12: me tog gi yal ga phreng ba re re zhing
T02D2520:112b-13: yang nyi ma gnyis pa la de dus gsum du
T02D2520:112b-14: bzlas brjod bya'o // de ltar bum pa'i bsnyen pa byas nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02D2520:112b-16: sangs rgyas spyan gyi mar la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg
T02D2520:112b-17: re re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad byas te 'di ni
T02D2520:112b-18: lag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02D2520:112b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod la /
T02D2520:112b-20: mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis 'khor dang bcas pa yang
T02D2520:112b-21: dag par legs par mchod la snga ma bzhin du
T02D2520:112b-22: phyag byas nas mchod yon phul te /
T02D2520:112b-23: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02D2520:112b-24: de la dang por lag na me tog thogs pa'i
T02D2520:112b-25: slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la 'di skad
T02D2520:112b-27: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D2520:112b-28: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2520:112b-29: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2520:112b-30: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2520:112b-31: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02D2520:112b-32: byang chub sems kyang stsal du gsol //
T02D2520:112b-33: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2520:112b-34: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02D2520:112b-36: de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02D2520:112b-37: lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje blangs te /
T02D2520:112b-38: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham /
T02D2520:112b-39: zhes bya ba'i snying pos de'i snying gar rdo rje gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2520:112b-40: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2520:112b-41: rtog pa ma lus legs par bsdus nas ni //
T02D2520:113a-2: brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems stsogs pa'i //
T02D2520:113a-3: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02D2520:113a-4: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02D2520:113a-5: rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang //
T02D2520:113a-6: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni //
T02D2520:113a-7: spyan sngar ma lus de dag so sor bshags //
T02D2520:113a-8: bde gshegs rnams kyi tshogs gnyis bsags pa dang //
T02D2520:113a-9: sras rnams kyis ni zab cing mtha' med pa'i //
T02D2520:113a-10: 'gro ba ma lus don rnams grub mdzad dang //
T02D2520:113a-11: de las gzhan pa'ang bdag ni yi rang gi //
T02D2520:113a-12: thugs rjes gdung ba'i thabs dang ldan gyur cig / blo gros sdig med gti mug tshogs kun bcom //
T02D2520:113a-13: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang bzhugs pa //
T02D2520:113a-14: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2520:113a-15: rab mchog blo yi kun dga' ra ba ste //
T02D2520:113a-16: dman pa 'jigs par byed bas 'khor lo'i tshul //
T02D2520:113a-17: srid pa'i 'byor pa zil gyis gnon pa'i phul //
T02D2520:113a-18: gsung mchog chos kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2520:113a-19: 'dod chags la sogs dug gi sbrul bcom zhing //
T02D2520:113a-20: blo gros rnam rgyas thugs rje chen po'i yid //
T02D2520:113a-21: brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la skyabs gsol zhing //
T02D2520:113a-22: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2520:113a-23: rgyu yi rjes thogs bdag po'i yul nyid la //
T02D2520:113a-24: 'bras bu'i nus pas dgra yi tshogs las rgyal //
T02D2520:113a-25: so sor rig dang snying rje'i rtsa ba mchog / byang chub yang dag rig pa bdag gis gzung //
T02D2520:113a-26: sems can rnams ni yongs su smin phyir dang ;
T02D2520:113a-27: / bskyab pa'i phyir ram yang na bdag gi sems //
T02D2520:113a-28: yang dag nyid du dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2520:113a-29: thams cad rtsva mchog nyid du ltos pa med par sbyin //
T02D2520:113a-30: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02D2520:113a-31: bsam gtan dang ni shes rab bla med pa //
T02D2520:113a-32: bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya phyir 'di //
T02D2520:113a-33: skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi //
T02D2520:113a-34: bde gshegs sngags la rgya cher mkhas pa dang //
T02D2520:113a-35: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni //
T02D2520:113a-36: 'gro 'di rnams kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2520:113a-37: 'di na mkha' bzhin du ni gnas par bgyid //
T02D2520:113b-1: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdus pa 'di /
T02D2520:113b-2: bdag gis thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
T02D2520:113b-3: bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D2520:113b-4: bdag gis sems can thams cad la theg pa thams
T02D2520:113b-5: cad dang thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul
T02D2520:113b-6: nas / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2520:113b-7: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang /
T02D2520:113b-8: sems can 'ga' yang mya ngan 'das par gyur pa med do //
T02D2520:113b-10: bdag gis chos thams cad la skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bgyi'o //
T02D2520:113b-11: bdag gis ma yengs pa'i sems dang thams cad mkhyen
T02D2520:113b-12: pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2520:113b-13: pa drug la bslab par bgyi'o //
T02D2520:113b-14: bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o //
T02D2520:113b-15: bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
T02D2520:113b-16: rtsa bdun la gnas pa so sor rtog pa'i phyir
T02D2520:113b-17: bslab par bgyi'o // bdag gis stobs bcu dang /
T02D2520:113b-19: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
T02D2520:113b-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor
T02D2520:113b-21: rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o
T02D2520:113b-22: // de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos
T02D2520:113b-23: tshad med pa ma lus pa la mngon par gnas

T02D2520:113b-26: lta bur byang chub chen por sems bskyed ba yin
T02D2520:113b-27: te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang /
T02D2520:113b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang /
T02D2520:113b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste /
T02D2520:113b-30: 'di nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'o //
T02D2520:113b-31: de ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par byas
T02D2520:113b-32: pa'i dge ba'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di
T02D2520:113b-33: la gnas pas bde ba mtha' yas pa la gnas

T02D2520:113b-35: rdzogs pa la gdul bar bya ba'i skye bo'i tshogs
T02D2520:113b-36: ma lus pa la bde ba'i dbang phyug gi rab
T02D2520:113b-37: tu dbye ba mang po yang dag par bstan pas
T02D2520:114a-1: rab tu dga' ba'i gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2520:114a-2: de nas dpal chen mos slob ma'i lag tu dri phyin pa dang /
T02D2520:114a-3: rab tu dag pas me tog / rab tu dga' bas bdug spos /
T02D2520:114a-4: spyan gyis mar me sbyin zhing badzra ha sa zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas shing /
T02D2520:114a-5: phyag rgya mchog gis bsrung ba byas pa'i aa shva
T02D2520:114a-6: ttha las byas pa dris bsgos shing me tog gis
T02D2520:114a-8: badzra t'i ksh'a zhes bya ba bzlas pa'i ku sha gsar pa slob ma la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2520:114a-9: de nas dpung pa g-yon par mdud pa gsum dang
T02D2520:114a-10: ldan pa'i srung skud la aom badzra ra ksha ham
T02D2520:114a-11: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas la bdag nyid kyis
T02D2520:114a-12: yang dag par bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2520:114a-13: de nas aom buddha mee tri badzra raksha ham zhes
T02D2520:114a-14: bya ba mdud pa dang ldan pa'i sngags byams pa'i
T02D2520:114a-15: go chas go bskon par bya'o //
T02D2520:114a-16: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2520:114a-17: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02D2520:114a-18: mdzub mo gnyis kyi mdud pa dang //
T02D2520:114a-19: bdag gam gzhan la go bskon na //
T02D2520:114a-20: bdag po yi ni bsrung bar 'gyur //
T02D2520:114a-21: yang aom badzra stva aushn'i sha h'um phat /
T02D2520:114a-22: zhes bya ba slob ma'i spyi gtsug tu dgod do //
T02D2520:114a-23: de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bshad de /
T02D2520:114a-24: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la//
T02D2520:114a-25: mthe bo bsnyams pa bcug nas su //
T02D2520:114a-26: mdzub mo rtse mo bkab pas ni //
T02D2520:114a-27: sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes byar grags //
T02D2520:114a-28: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2520:114a-29: bzhin bzangs dag longs la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2520:114a-30: la phyag gis shig / nang par sems dpa' chen
T02D2520:114a-31: po'i grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2520:114a-32: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2520:114a-33: de nas mchod pa byas la bdug sbos gtul te /
T02D2520:114a-34: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa nye bar snyan gsan dbab pa spyan drangs la bya'o //
T02D2520:114a-35: rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2520:114a-36: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2520:114a-37: bdag ni brtse bar gyur nas su //
T02D2520:114a-38: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D2520:114a-39: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2520:114a-41: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02D2520:114a-42: de bas gnang ba mdzad par rigs //
T02D2520:114b-0: sangs rgyas @114b 'jig rten mgon brtse bas //
T02D2520:114b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i dgra bcom dang //
T02D2520:114b-2: gsang sngags lha gzhan gang lags dang //
T02D2520:114b-3: 'jig rten sbyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02D2520:114b-4: gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang //
T02D2520:114b-5: gang su lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i //
T02D2520:114b-6: sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams //
T02D2520:114b-7: bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2520:114b-8: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02D2520:114b-9: sang ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'i ming //
T02D2520:114b-10: 'di zhes bgyi ba ci nus kyis //
T02D2520:114b-12: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02D2520:114b-13: thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su //
T02D2520:114b-14: tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2520:114b-15: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02D2520:114b-17: lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2520:114b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la //
T02D2520:114b-19: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02D2520:114b-20: mchod yon phul ba sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par mchod la phyag byas te ;
T02D2520:114b-21: slob ma rnams la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bshad pa byas nas /
T02D2520:114b-22: slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa slob dpon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i mtha' logs su nyal bar bya'o //
T02D2520:114b-23: de nas skya rengs shar ba'i dus su khrus bya
T02D2520:114b-24: ba sngon du 'gro bas lha'i rnal 'byor byas la
T02D2520:114b-25: / nyi ma shar ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor bri ba brtsam par byas te /
T02D2520:114b-26: de bzhin du dang po'i rdo rjer bskyed nas /
T02D2520:114b-27: dang po kho nar srad bu tshon dmar po dang /
T02D2520:114b-31: dkar po dri zhim pos so sor btso bar bya'o //
T02D2520:114b-32: de nas rim pa de nyid kyis bzhag la /
T02D2520:114b-33: hr'i: aom h'um tr'am aa zhes bya ba'i sa bon
T02D2520:114b-34: gyi yi ge rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
T02D2520:114b-35: dpag med dang / don yod grub pa dang /
T02D2520:114b-38: rnam par snang mdzad srad bu la rnam par bsams la /
T02D2520:114b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la sogs pa
T02D2520:114b-40: rang rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa rang gi sa
T02D2520:114b-41: bon gyi 'od zer srad bu rang rang gi thugs
T02D2520:114b-42: ka las yang dag par gtong bar bsam par bya'o
T02D2520:114b-43: // de nas de rnams 'bar ba'i lta ba dang /
T02D2520:114b-44: dza hri zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la /
T02D2520:115a-0: lcags kyus bkug nas rang gi lag pa gnyis su @115a * //
T02D2520:115a-2: rang gi lag par bzhag pa de rnams kyi phyi
T02D2520:115a-3: rol gyi srad bu la kun du gang bar bsams
T02D2520:115a-5: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a spha
T02D2520:115a-6: ra spha ra aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a h'um
T02D2520:115a-7: / aa tyan ta aa nu pra bishti sarba dharm'a h'um /
T02D2520:115a-9: de nas dri bzang pos byugs pa'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du bzhag la /
T02D2520:115a-10: me tog gis gtor te yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2520:115a-11: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02D2520:115a-12: zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
T02D2520:115a-13: bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02D2520:115a-14: de nas dkyil 'khor gyis dri zhim pos byug la ;
T02D2520:115a-15: me tog gi sil ma gtor te /
T02D2520:115a-16: nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D2520:115a-17: glu dang rol mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2520:115a-18: mig g-yas g-yon du dza gnyis las nyi ma dang zla ba kha dog ser po bskyed de /
T02D2520:115a-19: yid la h'um 'don cing rnam par snang mdzad du bsgyur nas /
T02D2520:115a-21: rang gi snying ga las sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo rje las kyi gzugs su drangs la phung ste /
T02D2520:115a-22: h'um zhes bya ba 'don cing yang rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2520:115a-23: pa chen por bdag nyid bsams la dri zhim po
T02D2520:115a-24: dang / yungs kar dang ldan pa'i tshon dkar po dang lhan cig bsgos te /
T02D2520:115a-25: srad bu de dang po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
T02D2520:115a-26: phyi nas ci bder bya ba dang /
T02D2520:115a-27: rim pa 'dis thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2520:115a-28: de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bya ste /
T02D2520:115a-29: yi ge dzas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo rje las kyi gzugs can gyi lag tu gtad la /
T02D2520:115a-30: phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas slob dpon nub tu gnas nas shar du bltas te /
T02D2520:115a-31: tshangs pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2520:115a-32: yang lho phyogs su gnas nas /
T02D2520:115a-34: tshangs pa'i thig gnyis pa gdab par bya'o //
T02D2520:115a-35: de nas shar lho'i mtshams su gnas nas byang du bltas te /
T02D2520:115a-36: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi logs thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2520:115a-37: de nas nub byang mtshams su gnas nas lho phyogs su kha bltas te /
T02D2520:115a-38: nub phyogs kyi logs thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2520:115b-0: de bzhin du gnas nas shar du kha @115b bltas te byang phyogs kyi logs thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2520:115b-1: yang shar lho mtshams kyi chal 'dug nas /
T02D2520:115b-2: nub phyogs su bltas te lho phyogs kyi logs thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2520:115b-3: de bzhin du khyams kyi thig dang /
T02D2520:115b-4: lha'i snam bu'i thig gdab par shes par bya'o //
T02D2520:115b-5: thams cad du slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog
T02D2520:115b-6: ni g-yas su bskor ba'i tshul gyis 'gro bar shes

T02D2520:115b-8: nub byang mtshams kyi bar du srad bu brkyang ste thig gdab pa dang /
T02D2520:115b-9: yang lho nub mtshams su 'dug la byang shar mtshams
T02D2520:115b-10: su srad bu brkyang ste thig gdab par shes par

T02D2520:115b-12: de la thig gi sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D2520:115b-13: aom badzra su tra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya'o //
T02D2520:115b-14: dza dza dza zhes bya ba'i dza gsum dang /
T02D2520:115b-15: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis srang bu drang bar bya'o //
T02D2520:115b-16: de la sgo thams cad dang sgo khyud ni brgyad char bya'o //
T02D2520:115b-18: kha khyer dang lha'i snam bu ni sgo'i phyed kyi tshad do //
T02D2520:115b-19: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed kyi tshad do //
T02D2520:115b-20: rta babs ni sgo'i su ma 'gyur du bya'o //
T02D2520:115b-21: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed ni nang gi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2520:115b-25: rta babs med par legs par thig gdab la /
T02D2520:115b-26: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ldeng gi phur bu 'og rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu la /
T02D2520:115b-27: steng rdo rje rtse lnga lta bur byas te /
T02D2520:115b-29: aom badzra k'i lik'i li ya sarba bi ghn'a bam h'um phat /
T02D2520:115b-30: ces brgyar tsa brgyad bzlas te rdo rjes brdung bar bya'o //
T02D2520:115b-31: de la btags pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2520:115b-32: gyi phyi rol gyi rdo rje phreng ba'i thig gdab
T02D2520:115b-33: par bya'o // de la dkyil 'khor brgyad 'dra ba'i
T02D2520:115b-34: ka brgyad kyi thig cha mnyam par thig gdab par
T02D2520:115b-35: par bya'o // bya ste / shar phyogs kyi phyi'i ka ba'i thig ni /
T02D2520:115b-36: lho phyogs kyi char 'dug la byang du bltas te thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2520:115b-37: nub phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig ni byang phyogs
T02D2520:115b-38: kyi char gnas la lho phyogs su bltas te gdab
T02D2520:116a-0: bo // byang phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig ni nub phyogs su 'dug la shar @116a * //
T02D2520:116a-1: gyi phyogs su bltas te gdab par bya ste /
T02D2520:116a-2: lho phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig ni shar phyogs
T02D2520:116a-3: kyi char 'dug la nub tu bltas te gdab bo
T02D2520:116a-4: // da ni lung las gsungs pa'i thig gdab pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D2520:116a-5: de nas thig ni gdab bya ba //
T02D2520:116a-6: srad bu nyis 'gyur dag gis te //
T02D2520:116a-7: nam mkha' thams cad char 'gyur bas //
T02D2520:116a-8: tshad med pa ni tshad yin no //
T02D2520:116a-9: bzang po sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas //
T02D2520:116a-10: phyogs rnams thams cad mnyam pa nyid //
T02D2520:116a-11: shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor //
T02D2520:116a-12: thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad ;
T02D2520:116a-13: / zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2520:116a-14: khyams rnams kyis ni legs par bskor //
T02D2520:116a-15: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2520:116a-17: dkyil 'khor kun gyi grva rnams dang //
T02D2520:116a-18: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
T02D2520:116a-19: zla ba phyed la rab gnas pa'i ;
T02D2520:116a-20: / rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras //
T02D2520:116a-21: mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi ste //
T02D2520:116a-22: dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi'o //
T02D2520:116a-23: bsam gtan rnams ni rta babs bzhi //

T02D2520:116a-25: kha khyer la brten rdo rje'i bdag / gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin //
T02D2520:116a-26: rgyan rnams kun gyis dgram pa yang //
T02D2520:116a-27: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02D2520:116a-28: gdul bya spyod pa sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs pa yin //
T02D2520:116a-29: me long ye shes rtags me lod //
T02D2520:116a-30: byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02D2520:116a-31: dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog / nyi ma zla ba yang dag ldan //
T02D2520:116a-32: kun grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02D2520:116a-33: bde ba chen po zhes grags pa'o //
T02D2520:116a-35: de yi nang gi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2520:116a-36: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dag dang mtshungs //
T02D2520:116a-37: rdo rje'i thig ni yongs btab pas //
T02D2520:116a-38: rdo rje'i 'khor lo zhes byar grags //
T02D2520:116a-39: byang chub sems ni theg pa che //
T02D2520:116a-40: rdo rje'i thig ni rab bskor bas //
T02D2520:116a-41: rdo rje'i thig ni yongs btab la //
T02D2520:116a-42: rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri //
T02D2520:116a-43: yang dag bris te kun gyi mchog / thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin 'gro //
T02D2520:116a-44: thog ma med cing mchog nyid pas //
T02D2520:116a-45: phyogs rnams thams cad mnyam pa yin //
T02D2520:116b-1: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
T02D2520:116b-3: bha ga b'a na badzra r'a dza h'um phat ces brjod la /
T02D2520:116b-4: dkyil 'khor lte ba la gnas pa'i phur bu phyung la /
T02D2520:116b-5: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i kha bkang ste mnyam par bya'o //
T02D2520:116b-6: de nas mig gnyis su hr'i: las zla ba dang nyi ma bskyed la ;
T02D2520:116b-7: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas te sgo rnams dbye'o //
T02D2520:116b-8: de nas tshon sbyangs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2520:116b-9: aom tsi tra sa ma ye h'um zhes bya bas /
T02D2520:116b-10: phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pas tshon thams cad la lan bdun bzlas na /
T02D2520:116b-11: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2520:116b-12: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2520:116b-13: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis las ni //
T02D2520:116b-14: mdzub mo'i rtse mo mnyam sbyar bas //
T02D2520:116b-15: byas la tshon rtsi thams cad ni //
T02D2520:116b-16: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //

T02D2520:116b-21: sngon po la ni sngon po'o //
T02D2520:116b-22: ljang gu la ni ljang gu'o //
T02D2520:116b-23: dmar po la ni dmar po bcug nas /
T02D2520:116b-24: ji skad du bshad pa'i 'bar ba'i lta bas /
T02D2520:116b-25: mngon par sbyangs pa'i dus su yang dang po'i rdo rje'i thog mar tshon dgye ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2520:116b-26: tshon thams cad dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te bskor phyogs su h'um zlos shing dgye la /

T02D2520:116b-33: dkar po ni thams cad kyi nang rol du'o //
T02D2520:116b-35: dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar sna tshogs padma'i gdan la /

T02D2520:116b-39: nas / gzugs dang gcig tu bsre bar bya'o //

T02D2520:116b-41: gang gi phyir lha thams cad kyi yang dgod pa'i snying po ni h'um 'di nyid do //
T02D2520:116b-42: de la de'i mdun du rdo rje yid las byung ba sku mdog dmar skya /

T02D2520:123b-8: ba gang yin pa de khyod kyis bya dgos so
T02D2520:123b-9: nga yin gyis / // khyod kyis nga la brnyas
T02D2520:123b-10: par ma byed cig / mi bde ba ma spangs
T02D2520:123b-11: bar khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur
T02D2520:123b-13: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2520:123b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
T02D2520:123b-15: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig / ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02D2520:123b-16: de nas slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa'i rdo rje phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2520:123b-18: 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02D2520:123b-19: 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //
T02D2520:123b-20: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02D2520:123b-21: rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di ;
T02D2520:123b-22: / de ring nyid du 'bab par shog / de
T02D2520:123b-23: nas badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba 'di
T02D2520:123b-24: lan brgya zlos su gzhug go //
T02D2520:123b-25: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la /
T02D2520:123b-26: sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya phye ste /
T02D2520:123b-27: h'um aa: aa: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos su gzhug go //
T02D2520:123b-28: sbyor ba gnyis ka yang 'od zer dmar po 'bar
T02D2520:123b-29: ba'i 'od kyis kun nas 'khrigs pa'i rdo rje sems
T02D2520:123b-30: dpa' kun du gang bar bsams na nges par 'bab
T02D2520:123b-31: par 'gyur ro // lha'i ye shes kyang 'di las skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2520:123b-32: de nas me tog gi phreng bas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2520:123b-33: gdong g-yogs dgrol zhing dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang /
T02D2520:123b-34: 'jug pa'i phyag rgyas dgrol ba dang /
T02D2520:123b-35: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho gar bstan pa'i sbyor bas byed du gzhug go //
T02D2520:123b-36: de nas de bzhin du padma bris la /
T02D2520:123b-37: slob ma de rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2520:123b-38: padma de la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos nye bar bzhag la /
T02D2520:123b-40: mchod yon byin la ma tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2520:123b-41: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs te /
T02D2520:123b-42: slob dpon gyi cho gas dbang bskur zhing chu de 'thung du bcug ste 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2520:124a-2: / dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D2520:124a-3: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02D2520:124a-5: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2520:124a-6: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02D2520:124a-7: skye bo 'dus pa'i nang gnas shing //
T02D2520:124a-8: dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur//
T02D2520:124a-9: de nas phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang //
T02D2520:124a-10: cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba dang /

T02D2520:124a-12: ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /

T02D2520:124a-16: mtshon cha la sogs pas de yang dag par mchod
T02D2520:124a-17: la / de la snying po byin te /

T02D2520:124a-19: de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bshad de /
T02D2520:124a-20: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa bcug la /
T02D2520:124a-21: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga thams cad dang /
T02D2520:124a-23: lha'i de kho na nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02D2520:124a-24: 'di dag gis ni dbang bskur bar gyur pa yin no //
T02D2520:124a-25: de nas dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya ste /
T02D2520:124a-26: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las rab tu khru do dor
T02D2520:124a-27: la dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor shar phyogs kyi sgor
T02D2520:124a-28: bltas pas / nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi tshad tsam zur bzhi pa sgo nub tu bltas la /
T02D2520:124a-29: tshon gyi phye ma sna lngas bri bar bya ste /
T02D2520:124a-30: dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D2520:124a-31: de'i steng du dang po'i rdo rje kha dog dmar po bri bar bya'o //
T02D2520:124a-32: de nas dkyil 'khor de me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2520:124a-34: ras kyis g-yogs pa'i seng ge'i gdan nam /
T02D2520:124a-35: stan nang tshangs can rdo rje rtse mo mngon par bzlas pa der bzhag ste /
T02D2520:124a-36: de yang dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2520:124a-37: dpal rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2520:124a-38: de'i lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas su snga ma bzhin du padma'i gdan bsams nas /
T02D2520:124a-39: gdan de rnams la dang po'i rdo rje snying po
T02D2520:124a-40: dang bcas pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2520:124a-41: pa bskyed de / gdan de la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen por 'dug nas /
T02D2520:124a-42: dang po'i rdo rje de nyid dang /
T02D2520:124a-43: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas snying ga dang /
T02D2520:124b-0: spyi bo rnams su byin gyis @124b brlab pa dang /
T02D2520:124b-1: seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du bla re bre zhing /
T02D2520:124b-3: me tog chun pos brgyan pa'i gdugs dkar po rin
T02D2520:124b-4: po che'i tog can la h'um bzlas pa bzhag pa
T02D2520:124b-5: dang / g-yon gyi phyogs kyi char dar sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2520:124b-6: ba dan la nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags bzlas pa bzhag la mchod yon phul te /
T02D2520:124b-7: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2520:124b-11: ru dud la sogs pa'i rol mo rnams rol mo'i
T02D2520:124b-12: phyag rgyas byin gyi brlabs kyi bslab pa'i sgra dang
T02D2520:124b-13: / phyi rol du glu dang gar rnams bya ba dang /
T02D2520:124b-14: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D2520:124b-15: de nas yon gyi mchog blangs la /
T02D2520:124b-16: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku gzugs de'i spyi bor bzhag la /
T02D2520:124b-17: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o //
T02D2520:124b-18: de la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2520:124b-19: phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
T02D2520:124b-20: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa //
T02D2520:124b-21: sangs rgyas padma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02D2520:124b-22: bkra shis des ni skye dgu zhi byed dang po'o //
T02D2520:124b-23: de yi nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g-yo ba //
T02D2520:124b-24: 'jigs rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02D2520:124b-25: chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa //
T02D2520:124b-26: 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o //
T02D2520:124b-27: dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thob pa'i bkra shis
T02D2520:124b-28: phyug / mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis
T02D2520:124b-29: mchod pa'i gnas // tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi zhing //
T02D2520:124b-30: de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o //
T02D2520:124b-31: sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba'o //
T02D2520:124b-32: don rnams thams cad 'grub par brtul ba yongs ldan pa //
T02D2520:124b-33: tshogs kyi las dgyes thub pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba //
T02D2520:124b-34: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D2520:124b-35: shog /'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga'
T02D2520:124b-36: ldan lha'i // gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te //
T02D2520:124b-37: dbang bcas lhas bskor ba yi bkra shis gang byung ba //
T02D2520:124b-38: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D2520:124b-39: shog / lo ma me tog 'od 'bar lumbi'i tshal
T02D2520:124b-40: // lha mo dag gis brten par mgon po bltams pa na //

T02D2520:125a-1: skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / gror khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du //

T02D2520:125a-4: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed

T02D2520:125a-6: bya bar ni // rmad du grags pa che ba lha yis mngon bstod pa //
T02D2520:125a-7: bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang //
T02D2520:125a-8: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D2520:125a-9: shog / dgyes shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas

T02D2520:125a-12: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D2520:125a-13: shog / bee d'u rya ltar sdo pa'i rtsva bting
T02D2520:125a-14: steng bzhugs te // skyil mo krung bcas mi g-yo mchog gi bkra shis gang //
T02D2520:125a-15: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D2520:125a-16: shog / chu bo'i 'gram na rtsva sha'i phreng gis
T02D2520:125a-17: yongs bskor ba // shin tu rmad du byung ba srid pa sel mdzad pa //
T02D2520:125a-18: klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang //
T02D2520:125a-19: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D2520:125a-20: shog / shin rgyal drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis
T02D2520:125a-21: bdud kyi phyogs // mang po btul tshe sa steng dang ni nam mkha' la //
T02D2520:125a-22: bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang byung ba //
T02D2520:125a-23: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la bzhi byed
T02D2520:125a-24: shog / sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje
T02D2520:125a-25: gdan bzhugs te / nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dag rnams 'dul ba /
T02D2520:125a-26: ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba //
T02D2520:125a-27: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02D2520:125a-28: grong khyer b'a r'a na s'ir grong khyer mchog zhugs nas //
T02D2520:125a-29: chos kyi 'khor lo mchog bskor ba yi bkra shis gang //
T02D2520:125a-30: lha yul dang 'dir shin tu rmad du byung 'gyur ba //
T02D2520:125a-31: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D2520:125a-32: shog ; bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa
T02D2520:125a-33: dag byed pas // bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa //
T02D2520:125a-34: bcom ldan sh'akya thub pa seng ges kun gsungs pa //
T02D2520:125a-35: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed

T02D2520:125b-10: lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang //
T02D2520:125b-11: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D2520:125b-12: shog / lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos

T02D2520:125b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis gang //
T02D2520:125b-15: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D2520:125b-16: shog / de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang

T02D2520:125b-19: rdo rje gzugs la sogs pa de dag dang /
T02D2520:125b-20: de nas bum pa de rnams kyis so //
T02D2520:125b-21: de'i 'og tu rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02D2520:125b-22: de bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya zhing gzung du yang gzhug go //
T02D2520:125b-23: de nas phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2520:125b-25: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2520:125b-28: ming gi dbang bskur ba yang byin la /
T02D2520:125b-29: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs yang sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2520:125b-30: de nas me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D2520:125b-31: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag
T02D2520:125b-32: rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis dum bu gnyis pa'i rtsa
T02D2520:125b-33: ba'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa rnams kyis yang dag
T02D2520:125b-34: par mchod la / chos dang de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig rnams sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2520:125b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du yang

T02D2520:125b-38: rdo rje rigs las khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'o //
T02D2520:125b-39: padma'i rigs las padma'i khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'o //

T02D2520:126a-0: @126a * // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni dkar po'o //
T02D2520:126a-1: rdo rje dkyil 'khor la ni sngon bo'o //
T02D2520:126a-3: rin po che'i dkyil 'khor la ni ser por shes par bya'o //
T02D2520:126a-4: de nas snga ma bzhin du cho ga rnams bzhin rjes su spyad la /
T02D2520:126a-5: yi ge phras byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che'i thur ma'am /

T02D2520:126a-9: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02D2520:126a-10: 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar //
T02D2520:126a-11: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02D2520:126a-12: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02D2520:126a-13: aom badzra ni tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hr'i:/
T02D2520:126a-14: de nas me long la sogs la chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02D2520:126a-15: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D2520:126a-16: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D2520:126a-17: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D2520:126a-18: rgyu dang las las byung ba ste //
T02D2520:126a-19: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //

T02D2520:126a-21: sems can don ni bla med byos //
T02D2520:126a-22: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02D2520:126a-23: de nas yi ge hos mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu byin la /
T02D2520:126a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod la /
T02D2520:126a-25: phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi phan du gzhug / steng du yang 'phen du gzhug la /
T02D2520:126a-26: aom badzra r'a ga ho: zhes kyang smrar gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2520:126a-28: zhes pas me long bstan la /
T02D2520:126a-29: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2520:126a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02D2520:126a-31: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D2520:126a-32: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni //
T02D2520:126a-33: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs ;
T02D2520:126a-34: / de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag gang //
T02D2520:126a-35: byang chub sems 'dir shes par gyis //
T02D2520:126a-36: de nas badzra he tu mam /
T02D2520:126a-37: zhes bya bas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis su dgod pa dang /
T02D2520:126a-38: badzra bha sha ram zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2520:126a-39: dung lag pa g-yas par byin la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2520:126a-40: de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02D2520:126a-41: skyob pa rnams ni 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2520:126a-42: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02D2520:126a-43: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis //
T02D2520:126a-44: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02D2520:126a-45: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //

T02D2520:126b-17: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2520:126b-18: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D2520:126b-20: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02D2520:126b-21: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2520:126b-22: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D2520:126b-23: nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D2520:126b-24: zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2520:126b-28: nam mkha' snying po'i nga rgyal dang /
T02D2520:126b-29: tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis rjes su gnang ba byin la /
T02D2520:126b-30: rang gi lha'i snying po sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2520:126b-31: de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02D2520:126b-32: gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2520:126b-33: slob ma thams cad la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2520:126b-34: aom 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan pa //
T02D2520:126b-35: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2520:126b-36: srid pa gsum du grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2520:126b-37: srid pa'i ngan 'gro dag las bton //
T02D2520:126b-38: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de
T02D2520:126b-39: bzhin gshegs pa siddhi sa ma satvam bhur bhu ba
T02D2520:126b-40: sva: de la gzengs bstod nga ni 'di yin te
T02D2520:126b-41: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02D2520:126b-42: g-yon pa chos gos kyi mthar 'dzin pa'i tshul dang g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i tshul byas la /
T02D2520:126b-43: cho ga lhag ma rnams ni dum bu gnyis pa las shes par bya'o //
T02D2520:126b-45: rjes su bsgrub pa'i yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2520:126b-46: de nas sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D2520:126b-47: slob ma bsang gtor byas la /
T02D2520:126b-49: de'i g-yas pa'i mthe bong lag pa g-yas pa g-yon pas bzung nas /
T02D2520:126b-50: h'um gis mar gyi sbyin sreg lan bdun byas la /
T02D2520:127a-1: gyis slob ma la bskor ba bya ste /
T02D2520:127a-2: de nyid kyis dgang blugs gsum dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2520:127a-3: de nas sangs rgyas spyan gyi de bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2520:127a-4: de nas slob ma'i lag par rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i gdu bu btags la /
T02D2520:127a-5: de nyid bzlas pa'i chus bsang gtor bya'o //
T02D2520:127a-6: aom ru ru aaphu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ni sarba aartha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2520:127a-7: zhes bya ba sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags dang /
T02D2520:127a-8: snying gar byugs te slob ma gtang bar bya ba ni /
T02D2520:127a-9: slob ma'i thun mong gi cho ga'o //
T02D2520:127a-10: gang zhig slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba la ni de la dmigs te /
T02D2520:127a-11: mar gyi sreg blugs brgya h'um zhes bya ba dang sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2520:127a-12: de nas sangs rgyas spyan gyi yang sbrang rtsi dang /
T02D2520:127a-13: mar dang zho dang bsres pa'i ting gis sbyin sreg
T02D2520:127a-14: brgya rtsa brgyad sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags nyid kyis
T02D2520:127a-15: dbul lo // de nas de bzhin du gdu bu btags la bsang gtor byas te /
T02D2520:127a-16: snying gar byugs nas yang snga ma bzhin du thab kyi nang du dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D2520:127a-17: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams la sbyin sreg phul nas /
T02D2520:127a-18: yang dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas /
T02D2520:127a-19: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de //
T02D2520:127a-20: phyi rol du gtor ma byin la nye reg bya ste /
T02D2520:127a-21: phyag rgya dgrol pa la sogs ba sngar bshad pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2520:127a-22: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2520:127a-23: de nas de bzhin du rang gi lus la sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bcug la /
T02D2520:127a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas ba nyid pas /
T02D2520:127a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa nyid do //
T02D2520:127a-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas /
T02D2520:127a-27: rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do //
T02D2520:127a-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas /
T02D2520:127a-29: chos thams cad du ma nyid do //
T02D2520:127a-30: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa nyid pas /
T02D2520:127a-31: las thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid do //
T02D2520:127a-32: sems can chen po legs so legs //
T02D2520:127a-33: bde ba chen po legs so legs //
T02D2520:127a-34: theg pa chen po legs so legs //
T02D2520:127a-35: blo gros chen po legs so legs //
